description: Convicted murderer "Johnny the Gypsy" is caught in Sardinia after escaping for the seventh time.
title: Italian killer who fled jail for seventh time found in sheep pen
title_page: Italian killer who fled jail for seventh time found in sheep pen - BBC News
maintext: Mastini, who had dyed his hair blond in an effort to conceal his identity, reportedly told police he had "run away for love", but did not elaborate.
